name: Word Wash: Ballad of the Whale
name_original: Word Wash: Ballad of the Whale
description:
Whalo is sick, get to the road and heal him!

Bubbles are filling the area, combine them together to make words. The quicker you spell the faster you get there, but watch out for cars and obstacles on the road!

Word Wash : Ballad of the Whale mixes word and runner gameplay to challenge you to think and react in new ways.
